high_descs: Take a step forward and turn left and walk forward to face the card on the top of the dresser.
Pick up the card on the dresser.
Turn around and step forward to face the couch.
Place the card on the right side of the couch.
anns.task_desc: To move a card from the dresser to the right side of the couch.

high_descs: walk straight then turn left then turn right and walk towards the couch and turn left and walk towards the tv
pick up the credit card on the tv stand
turn right then turn right again and walk towards the couch
put the credit card down on the couch
anns.task_desc: move the credit card from the tv stand to the couch

high_descs: Walk ahead and then left to the center of the TV stand.
Pick up the blue credit card on the TV stand.
Turn around and walk to the couch.
Place the credit card on the right cushion of the couch, near the middle and up towards the edge.
anns.task_desc: Place a credit card on a couch.
